cause.description:
Pre-school children in Dar Es-Salaam limited to 30 students in 8-feet-square room with no windows. Majority of area women are illiterate with classes on the ground, under a canvas shelter (NEF provided), no water or other resources. Students need regular health exams, school health education, referrals, subsidies for poor unable to go to our health center; expand into another school of mostly drop-outs/orphan students mornings, adult women afternoons, family health/income teaching evenings.
1. "Education is important for people...only way out of this misery. They have to believe in education for themselves and their kid--something that's hard when you and everyone around you is illiterate." - "Sheik" Ahmed Omar, 35, Founder of Al Tawheed Sc
cause.mission: provide hope to these children through Elemental school rehabilitation; construction of a pre-school; literacy/adult education for women; health education & treatment by NEF clinic
cause.name: Schooling for Sudan Orphan Refugees
